entry.title: $2200 // 2 bedroom apt heat and hot water included!
entry.content:
Renovated 2 bed apt located on the second floor with a full kitchen, bathroom, and living room with plenty of closet space.

A 2-minute walk to 4 Ave/9 St train station (F, G, and R trains). Shops, bars, and restaurants within walking distance. Walking distance to Prospect Park and Barclays Center. Heat and hot water are included. No dogs allowed.

There are no fees except for $50 non-refundable cash credit check per person. If interested please bring ID, last 2 paystubs as proof of employment. First month's rent and one-month security deposit are required upon signing of the lease.
